decision_conditions:
<p><span data-sheets-value="{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:&quot;Detailed drawings/full particulars of the proposed development showing the matters set out below must be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority, in writing, before any work is commenced. The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved.\n\nREASON: To ensure that the external appearance of the building is satisfactory and does not detract from the character and visual amenity of the area.&quot;}" data-sheets-userformat="{&quot;2&quot;:15299,&quot;3&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:0},&quot;4&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:65280},&quot;9&quot;:0,&quot;10&quot;:0,&quot;11&quot;:4,&quot;12&quot;:0,&quot;14&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:3,&quot;3&quot;:1},&quot;15&quot;:&quot;Arial&quot;,&quot;16&quot;:12}" style="">Detailed drawings/full particulars of the proposed development showing the matters set out below must be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority, in writing, before the relevant work commences. The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved:</span></p><ul><li>1:20 elevation of each window, showing the glazing pattern; and
1:5 sections through the frames showing the material, profile, and dimensions; and&nbsp;</li><li>&nbsp;1:20 existing and proposed cross-sections of the doors; and&nbsp;</li><li>full details of the verandah at 1:50 including materials.</li></ul><p>REASON: To ensure that the external appearance of the building is satisfactory and does not detract from the character and visual amenity of the area.<br></p>

<p>Prior to superstructure works, detailed specification and a drainage layout of at least one
suitable sustainable drainage systems (i.e. water butt, raingarden, bioretention planter box,
living roof (substrate depth of 80-150 mm excluding the vegetative mat), permeable paving,
etc.) shall be submitted to, and approved by the LPA, in consultation with the LLFA. If
soakaways i.e. plastic modules and soakaway rings are used, an infiltration test must be
carried out to ensure that the capacity of the soil is suitable for infiltration. It must be
demonstrated that there will be no increase in surface water flow being discharged offsite and
an overall reduction in peak flow rate and volume.
</p><p>REASON: To ensure that the development will provide a sustainable drainage system.<br></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">The roof lights shown in drawing 2211/4A&nbsp; shall be flushed with the roof slopes. Detailed drawings/full particulars of the proposed development showing the matters set out below must be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority, in writing, before the relevant work commences. The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved. Full details of design, type, section through, and its relationship with the roof slopes shall be provided. </span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;"><br></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Reason: To reduce the visual impact to the conservation area. </span></p>

The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).
description: Erection of Verandah with a glazed roof attached to the flank wall of the ground floor rear ; installation of two rear roof lights to rear roof slope, alterations to doors and windows on the ground floor
